pkgmetadata.longdescription: ISA-L_crypto is a collection of optimized low-level functions targeting storage applications. ISA-L_crypto includes: * Multi-buffer hashes - run multiple hash jobs together on one core for much better throughput than single-buffer versions. * SHA1, SHA256, SHA512, MD5, SM3 * Multi-hash - Get the performance of multi-buffer hashing with a single-buffer interface. * Multi-hash + murmur - run both together. * AES - block ciphers * XTS, GCM, CBC * Rolling hash - Hash input in a window which moves through the input
